DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to test the the protective capacity of Goserelin compared with oral contraceptive
DOC.brief_title: Protection of Ovarian Function in Female Patients With Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Advanced stage Hodgkins Lymphoma (histologically proven) Normal FSHlevels Written informed consent Hodgkins Lymphoma as "composite lymphoma" Primary ovarial dysfunction Age > 40
